products.name: feature-flag-control-center
products.label: Feature Flag Control Center
products.short_description: Your team's "on-off switch" for new features. Choose the free Quickstart (free!) for dev/test or the Production plan for live apps.
products.long_description:
This DA deploys the IBM Cloud App Configuration service to give you real-time control over your application's features.

As a Product Manager, this gives you the power to safely test, launch, and 'kill switch' features without a new code deployment. 

Choose the flavor that's right for you:
* **Quickstart (free!):** A 100% free 'Lite' plan. Perfect for development, testing, and internal applications.
* **Production:** The paid 'Standard' plan for live applications. Enables a high volume of users, advanced features, and is fully supported.

features.title: ✅ Two Plans Available
features.description: Choose the 'Quickstart (free!)' plan for dev/test or the paid 'Production' plan for live apps.

features.title: Centralized PM Dashboard
features.description: A simple, web-based UI for you to manage all your features. No code required for you to make a change.

features.title: Controlled Rollouts
features.description: Safely test new features with a small percentage of users (e.g., "roll out to 5% of users") before a full launch.

features.title: Instant 'Kill Switch'
features.description: Instantly turn off a problematic feature without waiting for a developer or a hotfix.
